review: I take 5 or 10 mg for nighttime incontinence that started after menopause. It helps with daytime, too. It makes me a bit drowsy at night and dry mouth. I got off it for about two months, and the incontinence returned with pelvic floor pain. After 2 days back on this, it was better.

only  taken hyoscyamine one nite but it is the first night I have slept thru the whole nite in years
Levsin SL (hyoscyamine):Brand name: had no side effects and had 100% effectiveness on bladder control.
I have found this to be better than ditropan and detrol. I can take it twice a day. It doesn't seem to give me the dry mouth that ditropan did.
